actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to allow a deduction for a dependent who has attained the age of 65 or who is handicapped to the same extent as a deduction is allowable for a dependent who is a child.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a personal tax exemption for a dependent who has attained the age of 65 or who is handicapped to the same extent as a tax exemption is allowed for a dependent who is a child.

titles.title: A bill to allow a deduction for a dependent who has attained the age of 65 or who is handicapped to the same extent as a deduction is allowable for a dependent who is a child.
